action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a wardrobe, a pillow and a bed. The wardrobe is closed. The pillow is on the bed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. The wardrobe is empty.
You can't see a book here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard, a plate and a counter. The cupboard is closed. The plate is on the counter. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate and a potted plant.
You can't go to a living room from here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a refrigerator and a freezer. The refrigerator is closed. The freezer is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
You can't see a mop here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
I don't know what you mean.
> take mop and drop plate and take plate
I don't know what you mean.
I don't know what you mean.
> take mop and drop plate and take plate
I don't know what you mean.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't see a table here.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a hallway and a pantry here.
You can't see a mop here.
You can't go to a broom closet from here.
